msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

div.ab: (Col.) 136;;In Epeiph,;on the 3rd.;Sisois, son of Petesouchos and Tkonnos, grandson of Herakles: 4 drachmai;Sarapion, slave of Syros also called Ptolemaios: 28 obols;Patron, son of Sokmenis and Taonnophris, grandson of Sokmenis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Herais, daughter of Didas - (through) Titinmouis - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 obols; for olive (transportation), 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1/2 obol; for supplements, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, [[1/2 obol]] 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin:) 18 obols.;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios and Heras, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai.;Total for the day: 16 drachmai 17 obols.;;On the 4th, similarly:;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios and Tkollainis, grandson of Onnophris: 4 drachmai;Chairemon, son of Chairemon and Sokratiaine, grandson of Sambas: 13 obols; (and) for ch(--): 15 obols;Demetrous, daughter of Apollodoros, through Sempronia Gemella - (through) Sichiphas - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 7 drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 1/2 obol; for naubion, 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 5 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 5 drachmai; for supplements, 2 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 16 drachmai 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. ;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 1 drachme 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 11/2 obols 2 chalkoi; and;(for) Sempronia Petronia, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 10 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 2 1/2 obols; for naubion, 1 drachme; for supplements, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for eparourion, 6 drachmai 4 obols; for supplements, 3 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 2 obols 2 chalkoi.
